text: That's a lot of stuff! But at least it sounds like you're smashing through it, and whatever you can use and talk about it always great for interviews and showreels.

I'm still on fur, almost finished that though. Set up some simulations for those, and passed the set up onto someone else. I'm now working on some dust/pyro stuff, instancing in Arnold, but i'm on holiday for 2 and a bit weeks, so shall see the state of everything when I bet back
